books.title: Museum of Innocence
books.description: A love story between Kemal and Füsun set in 1970s Istanbul, exploring humiliation and memory.
books.author: Orhan Pamuk

books.title: The Shadow of the Wind
books.description: A young man’s search for the truth behind a mysterious author in post-war Barcelona.
books.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

books.title: The Leopard
books.description: The story portrays the decline of the aristocracy during the unification of Italy.
books.author: Giuseppe Tomasi di Lampedusa

books.title: The Little Prince
books.description: A philosophical tale about a young prince and his adventures, questioning human nature.
books.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

books.title: Koroglu
books.description: A Koroglu of Azerbaijan's ancient history and legends.
books.author: Alisher Navoiy

books.title: Don Quixote
books.description: A comedic and poignant story of a knight and his squire, exploring themes of reality and illusion.
books.author: Miguel de Cervantes

books.title: The Alchemist
books.description: A philosophical novel about pursuing your dreams and listening to your heart.
books.author: Paulo Coelho

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.description: A beloved classic novel that explores love, social status, and personal growth in 19th-century England.
books.author: Jane Austen

books.title: Love
books.description: A novel examining the lives and emotions of people caught between the worlds of East and West.
books.author: Elif Shafak

books.title: The Iliad
books.description: Homer's epic poem about the Trojan War and the heroes that shaped Greek mythology.
books.author: Homer

books.title: The Book Thief
books.description: A touching narrative of a young girl's bond with books, set during World War II in Nazi Germany.
books.author: Markus Zusak

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.description: A story about a young man navigating the challenges of adolescence and adulthood.
books.author: J.D. Salinger
